dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- Hammock Publishers
dmca.body:
HAMMOCK PUBLISHING

TO: Google AdSense Support, DMCA complaints
FROM: Rex Hammock, president, Hammock Publishing
Date: Oct 31, 2006

RE: Infringement notification for AdSense

1. The copyrighted work at issue is the test that appears on the following pages:

Example A
http://www.mybusinessmag.com/fullstory.php3?sid=1392

Example B
http://www.mybusinessmag.com/fullstory.php3?sid=1457

Example C
http://www.mybusinessmag.com/fullstory.php3?sid=1342

Example D
http://www.mybusinessmag.com/fullstory.php3?sid=1290

Example E
http://www.mybusinessmag.com/fullstory.php3?sid=1342

Example F
http://www.mybusinessmag.com/fullstory.php3?sid=1392

2. The following pages are infringing on the copyrighted work listed in item #1 above:

Corresponds to example A
http://uncommonbusiness.blogspot.com/2006_08_05_uncommonbusiness_archive.html

Corresponds to example B
http://uncommonbusiness.blogspot.com/2006/10/amazing-dog-sleepover-business.html

Corresponds to example C
http://uncommonbusiness.blogspot.com/2006/08/big-money-in-small-houses.html

Corresponds to example D
http://uncommonbusiness.blogspot.com/2006/08/guy-who-makes-living-fixing.html

Corresponds to example E
http://nichegeek.com/big_money_in_small_houses

Corresponds to example F
http://nichegeek.com/getting_rich_with_dummies

3. Google may use the following information to contact me:
Rex Hammock
President, Hammock Publishing
3322 West End Ave., Ste. 700
Nashville, TN 37203
615-690-3456
rhammock@hammock.com

4. I have been unable to obtain contact information for UncommonBusiness.Blogspot.com or NicheGeek.com

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials as described above is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
